name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After this character takes DMG or is healed: If this character has already been damaged or healed 2 times this Round, then this character's next attack this Round deals +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

(Once per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)

storytitle: Aeon Wave: Tome of the Eternal Flow
storytext:
"...For if the harbinger of the apocalypse would indeed one day arrive, the flood would wash everything away."
"The watchers would fight with both duty and joy in their our hearts, just as the goddess had found empathy for them in hers."
